attributes.action: Make developers responsible for creating area's of protected woodland.
attributes.background: Britain has one of the lowest woodland coverage's, reducing life quality and leaving wildlife with reduced sanctuary from our activity. Unless this is reversed, future generations risk inheriting a land devoid of open spaces, woodlands, wildlife, peace and quiet. Our duty is to protect not destroy.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
